text: Taylor Ramon Wilson (born May 7, 1994) is an American nuclear physics enthusiast and science activist. In 2008, at the age of 14, he produced nuclear fusion using a fusor and at the time was the youngest person ever to do so.Dutton, Judy. "Teen Nuclear Scientist Fights Terror", CNN.com, September 1, 2011.
